DOC.brief_summary: The aim propose research implement evaluate follow-up study impact Family Spirit family strengthen program among high-risk sample Apache mother child . The Family Spirit intervention 52-session home-visiting curriculum administer American Indian paraprofessional young mother 28 week gestation child 's first 3 year life . In series pilot study recently complete randomized controlled trial , Family Spirit intervention find positively impact several maternal , parent child outcome three year postpartum . In proposed study , investigator implement Family Spirit intervention young mother ( 12-20 year conception ) , revision several assessment measure curriculum substance abuse prevention curriculum module teach earlier original study .
DOC.detailed_description: This single group pre-post study design evaluate impact home visit intervention improve parent self-efficacy number maternal child health behavioral outcome among sample young mother , include maternal substance use . The Family Spirit intervention consist 52 session ( 30-60 minute duration ) deliver 39-month intervention phase . All session design teach participant 's home , may also occur another location choose participant ( e.g . study office , vehicle ) . Outcome data collect Baseline 2 month , 6 month , 12 month , 24 month 36 month postpartum .
